meanings.definition: To recognize the full worth or value of something.
meanings.sent1: I am appreciating the effort you put into this project.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys appreciating the beauty of nature.
meanings.sent3: Even the cat seems to be appreciating the sunshine today.
meanings.sent4: His kindness is like a flower, slowly appreciating in my heart.
meanings.sent5: I find myself constantly appreciating the little things in life.

meanings.definition: To understand or enjoy the value or significance of something.
meanings.sent1: They are appreciating the art displayed in the gallery.
meanings.sent2: Children often have a way of appreciating simple joys.
meanings.sent3: The robot started appreciating the taste of ice cream.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a beacon, instantly appreciating the room.
meanings.sent5: I am slowly appreciating the complexities of this novel.

meanings.definition: To increase in value over time.
meanings.sent1: The antique vase is appreciating in value each year.
meanings.sent2: Investors hope their stocks will keep appreciating.
meanings.sent3: The magic beans surprisingly started appreciating in the garden.
meanings.sent4: Her skills are like a fine wine, constantly appreciating with practice.
meanings.sent5: The old house is appreciating in charm as it gets renovated.
